radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral hemispheric atrophy with calcification in the bilateral basal ganglia and an isodense area in the left parietooccipital region.
Hyperintense area in the left parietooccipital region, no enhancement after contrast administration.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Reduction of the lesion in the parietooccipital region observed 2 months after admission.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Dilation of the cortical arteries and capillary blush without occlusive lesions in the left parietooccipital region.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Slighter decreased perfusion in the previously hyperperfused area observed 2 months after admission.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased regional cerebral blood flow in the left parietooccipital region corresponding to the lesion.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Reduction in uptake in the left parietal region observed 2 months after initial studies.
